channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13093] hive metastore does not exit on start failure
item.description:
If metastore startup fails for some reason, such as not being able to access the database, it fails to exit. Instead the process continues to be up in a bad state.

This is happening because of a non daemon thread.
item.summary: hive metastore does not exit on start failure

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The jstack of such a metastore is like this. Note the thread with HiveMetaStore.java in stack trace -

Daniel Dai Alan Gates Can you please review ?
